name: alternatives
description:
The alternatives command calculates multiple different routes between two points. Uses edge penalization to find genuinely different routes.

Useful for:
- Comparing route options
- Finding scenic alternatives
- Avoiding specific roads
- Traffic avoidance planning

options.-m, --mode: Travel mode: walk, bike, drive (default: drive)
options.-f, --format: Output format: text, geojson, json (default: text)

output:
Multiple route alternatives with:
- Route type (fastest, alternative 1, 2, etc.)
- Distance and time for each route
- Time/distance difference from fastest
- Color-coded route geometries (GeoJSON)
